entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • More refined categorization of tracing events? #113717
  • Unsafe.As not working properly with the Half data type. #113716
  • Tests failing to run in internal release branches #113710
  • build.cmd clr -msbuild fails #113708
  • Codesigning the apphost on macOS should preserve entitlements #113707
  • Support Socket.DuplicateAndClose through pidfd_getfd on Linux #113701
  • AIJsonUtilities.CreateJsonSchema does not support complex objects with nested references #113698
    Future
  • [wasm coreclr] exception handling #113694
  • [wasm coreclr] gc #113693
    Future
  • [wasm coreclr] pinvoke and intenal calls #113692
    Future
  • HttpWebRequest.AddRange generates incorrect header if called twice #113690
    10.0.0
  • AssemblyLoadContext never gets unloaded when a type is used in expression trees. #113687
  • [Long Running Test] 'System.Composition.UnitTests.ConcurrencyTests.SharedInstancesAreNotVisibleUntilActivationCompletes' #113686
  • System.Text.Json float and double outside their boundaries do not throw exception #113680

Closed

  • Unhandled exception from AcceptCompletionCallback #108026
    10.0.0
  • NativeAOT runtime crash with source-generated serialization ('Failed to create generic virtual method implementation') #113664
  • dotnet core 3.1 __pv_queued_spin_lock_slowpath #34678
  • someone PR to SQlitePCL.raw repo to support `linux-bionic-arm64` target #113691
  • SslStreamTlsResumeTests.ClientDisableTlsResume_Succeeds failed in CI #103449
    10.0.0
  • Build failure in browser-wasm #113685
  • `Cookie.GetHashCode()` does not ignore leading dot in Domain #112602
    10.0.0
  • CookieContainer doesn't replace Cookie with same name #84820
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Expose span on SpanSplitEnumerator #109874
    Future
  • Incorrect version of System.Resources.Extensions.dll / incorrectly generated binding redirect for System.Resources.Extensions #113683
    9.0.x
  • System.Security.Cryptography.DES.CreateDecryptor() crash on android #113149
  • QuicConnection.ConnectAsync() connection failure causes memory leak. #113030
  • [mono-runtime] "unknown option: -verbose" on mono based archs while running xunit console runner validating System.IO.Tests #113642
  • Recommend updating to msquic 2.4.8 #113136
    8.0.x
  • [JIT] Elide bounds check for reverse iteration over arrays and spans #9505
    Future
  • Elide bounds checks for partial array/span iteration #31638
    Future
  • Process not responsive dump indicates garbage collection #110350
    10.0.0
  • Add GitHub Container Image for dotnet #41722
  • Incorrect Base Offset for Dublin Timezone - Discrepancy Between Server and Local Machine #112650

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove GC Poll calls in FCalls. #113715
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Trigger superpmi-replay pipeline if LSRA files change #113714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Draft : Reduce TP by handling liveRegs separately #113713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Passthorugh publishing and sourcelink from the outer build #113712
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: revise escape analysis bit vector usage #113711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Graph-based loop inversion #113709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ILLink: Respect DisableRuntimeMarshalling #113706
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Doc comment improvements (mostly System.Formats.Nrbf) #113705
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • ILLink: Stop giving special treatment to icalls #113704
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [mono] Add a few bridge tests #113703
    area-GC-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #113702
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Do not report inlining decision to runtime in DEBUG mode #113700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] [Json] Avoid writing to PipeWriter if IAsyncEnumerable throws before first item #113699
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Tensor<T> select. Iteration along dimensions #113697
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] memory pressure for MSBuild #113696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Simple math intrinsics #113689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Card bundles for GC heap for arm32 implemented. #113688
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use bitwise operations to get the absolute values of integers #113679
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Utilize `Zba` extension #113678
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Detect M, A, F, C, V, and "B" extensions #113676
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RuntimeAsync] Docs: Add Await overloads for configured task awaitables. #113675
    runtime-async

Merged

  • Convert JitHelper `JIT_StrCns` to QCall #113674
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [browser] make in-tree samples work again #113695
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Changes from #113440 with diffs #113559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix dynamic static generic virtual method dispatch on generic types #113684
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [workloads] Bump the downlevels in main to 9.0.3/8.0.14 #113663
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] Fix for issue 109410 #113140
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Stub Precode variant for DynamicHelpers #113402
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [Json] Avoid writing to PipeWriter if IAsyncEnumerable throws before first item #113503
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: Re-introduce late `fgOptimizeBranch` pass #113491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Reduce size of x86 intrinsic jump table fallbacks #112556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "Revert "Revert "Pin SHAs for container images""" #113659
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reenable ClientDisableTlsResume_Succeeds test #113604
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix the WASM build break #113677
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Compress SafeSocketHandle.Unix booleans #112417
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Modernize `CookieContainer` domain-matching #112604
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • Add SpanSplitEnumerator.Source #113673
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Delete vestiges of unused assembly formats #113646
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix providers EC export and key derivation with newer OpenSSL and add TLS with TPM keys tests #113229
    area-System.Security
  • Remove CopyFile, GetTempFileName from PAL #113490
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete useless tests #113633
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Backport "Use FLS detach callback as a thread termination notification. Another try." #113055
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.5

Updated

  • Move unsupported target conditions to IL in mcc tests #112399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Loop cloning for Span #113575
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Statically link in native dependencies #113627
    area-Meta
  • Separate code manager for the interpreter #112985
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove `CryptoConfigForwarder` et al. #112306
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Reduce TP for targets with more than 64 Registers Part 1 #112704
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove HoistedLocal from runtime-async spec #112918
    runtime-async
  • [cDAC] Stack walk support more Frame types #112997
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Alternate approach for HELPER_METHOD_FRAME removal for arithmetic div… #113286
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Unblock Vector###<long> intrinsics on x86 #112728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Target NetFrameworkCurrent in tests and remove old mentions #113667
    needs-area-label
  • Remove helper method frames from Monitors #113242
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [HttpStress] Re-enable ASAN for msquic #113669
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser] managed Diagnostics.Metrics and Diagnostics.Tracing single-threaded #113524
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement region write barriers #111636
    arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Scaffold SLH-DSA based on ML-DSA #113634
    area-System.Security
  • Refactoring in AssertrionDesc #113440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ILLink : Fix instantiation tracking issue with icall/pinvoke parameters #113437
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support setting ACLs on file paths longer than `MAX_PATH` #109674
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 8.0.16
  • Interpreter GC info stage 1: Use templates to specialize gc info encoder/decoder #113223
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Additional support for signal async safe stack-walks. #113645
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix compare immediate and branch helper for 2^n #113523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • arm64: Optimise GT/GE/LT/LE comparisons in return statements #112863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [CI run only] Use funclets and new EH on win-x86 #113576
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve support for 512-bit Vector<T> #111472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disallow loading non-Explicit types with explicit field offsets #113500
    breaking-change, area-VM-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Initial CoreClr Android logcat log integration. #113416
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use await using in HttpContentJsonExtensions #113359
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/9.0-staging] [Apple mobile] Enable trimming on build machines to match ILLink features #113466
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.x
  • [RISC-V] 12-bit immediates in bit ops #113366
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] remove extra assert from WinHttp handler #112861
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • Remove `WasmFingerprintDotnetJs` tests and add `WriteImportMapToHtml` tests #112859
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • arm64: Add return cases into optimise bools #112945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Optimize loading 64 bit constant with new algorithm implementation and using `emitDataConst` #113250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix null reference exception in SslStream.Protocol #113606
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [Apple mobile] Run `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ExporterTypesTests.TypesTest` when `DataSetXmlSerializationIsSupported` is set #113084
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Update maintenance-packages dependencies #112152
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support HasThis calling convention in PersistedAssemblyBuilder #113666
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
